data.name: Out Of Hands
data.detailed_description:
In the night, I find myself to be made... OUT OF HANDS.


Out of Hands is a card-based thriller that blends card game, video collage and psychological horror. With live-action visuals incorporating the protagonist's facial features which are manifested by the real hands of the developer, the game aims to provide an intriguing and spine-chilling experience that leads you to combat the mental struggles and retrieve the lost memory.



The game is currently in development and we are constantly polishing the story and the gameplay. Please stay tuned for more lasted info related to the development progress and potential demo testing opportunities!

Fragmented yet intriguing story progression

Interact with your subconscious to uncover the story behind the photos. Connect the dots by gathering together the fragmented pieces of clues triggered by the items and places from the long-lost memory. The truth beneath is far beyond your imagination.

Nerve-racking and immersive card battles

Use your HANDS to grab the incoming cards, eliminate the inner demon and protect your heart. Always be on your toes and make proper decisions to maximize your resources and cope with the threats.



The inspiration for Out of Hands came from the theme "Capture" of Indie Camp, an annual game jam in China. Yang, creator of the game and the development team Game River, feels that hands may be the best medium to express this theme, thus using them as the very basic element of the game. Out of Hands is the winner of Best Game and Best Creative Direction at the 2021 XD Indie Camp.

data.short_description: Out of Hands is a thriller that blends card game, video collage and psychological horror. Aims to provide an intriguing and spine-chilling experience that leads you to combat the mental struggles and retrieve the lost memory.
data.supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium IV 2.6 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: An OpenGL 2.0 graphics adapter. NOT SUPPORTED: Radeon X1950, Intel GMA, Intel Gxx, Intel Qxx, Intel Mobile 9xx, Intel HD Graphics 1 or older.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD Athlon 64 X2 5600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia Geforce 9xxx / AMD Radeon HD / IntelHD 3000 series or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
